fusilli.data.get_data_moduleÔÉÅ

get_data_module(fusion_model, params, batch_size=8, image_downsample_size=None, layer_mods=None, max_epochs=1000, optional_suffix='', checkpoint_path=None, extra_log_string_dict=None, own_early_stopping_callback=None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Gets the data module for a specific fusion model and training protocol.

Parameters:

  • fusion_model (class) ‚Äì Fusion model class.

  • params (dict) ‚Äì Dictionary of parameters.

  • batch_size (int) ‚Äì Batch size (default 8).

  • image_downsample_size (list) ‚Äì List of image dimensions to downsample to (default None).

  • layer_mods (dict) ‚Äì Dictionary of layer modifications (default None).

  • optional_suffix (str) ‚Äì Optional suffix added to data source file names (default None).

  • checkpoint_path (str) ‚Äì Path to call checkpoint file (default None will result in the default lightning format).

  • extra_log_string_dict (dict) ‚Äì Dictionary of extra strings to add to a subspace method checkpoint file name (default None). e.g. if you‚Äôre running the same model with different hyperparameters, you can add the hyperparameters. Input format {‚Äúname‚Äù: ‚Äúvalue‚Äù}. In the run name, the extra string will be added as ‚Äúname_value‚Äù. And a tag will be added as ‚Äúname_value‚Äù. Default None.

  • own_early_stopping_callback (pytorch_lightning.callbacks.EarlyStopping) ‚Äì Early stopping callback class (default None).

Returns:

dm ‚Äì Datamodule for the specified fusion method.

Return type:

datamodule
